article_title: Cabrini Clinic names Kelly Herron executive director
article_text: Crain's Detroit Business is a metered site. Print and digital subscribers have unlimited access to stories, but registered users are limited to eight stories every 30 days. After viewing three metered stories, you'll be asked to register or log in. After eight more stories in 30 days, you'll be asked to subscribe.

article_metadata.description: St. Frances Cabrini Clinic in Detroit announced Kelly Herron, project manager for the Early Childhood Investment Corp. in Lansing, will join the medical clinic as executive director on April 7.

og.description: St. Frances Cabrini Clinic in Detroit announced Kelly Herron, project manager for the Early Childhood Investment Corp. in Lansing, will join the medical clinic as executive director on April 7.
